Package org.gs1

Class HealthcareGMN

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gs1.HealthcareGMN
  • public final class HealthcareGMN
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class that is both a demonstration and usable implementation of a check character generator and verifier for a GS1 GMN that is used for Regulated Healthcare medical devices that fall under the EU regulations EU MDR 2017/745 and EU IVDR 2017/746, herein referred to as a "healthcare GMN".

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      Complete a given partial healthcare GMN by appending the check character pair.
      static java.lang.String checkCharacters​(java.lang.String part)
      Calculates the check character pair for a given partial healthcare GMN.
      static boolean[] goodCharacterPositions​(java.lang.String gmn, boolean complete)
      Indicate whether each character in a given GMN belongs to the appropriate character set for the character position.
      static boolean verifyCheckCharacters​(java.lang.String gmn)
      Verify that a given healthcare GMN has a correct check character pair.

    • Method Detail

      • checkCharacters

        public static java.lang.String checkCharacters​(java.lang.String part)
                                        throws GS1Exception
        Calculates the check character pair for a given partial healthcare GMN.
        Parameters:
        part - a partial healthcare GMN.
        Returns:
        check character pair.
        Throws:
        GS1Exception - if the format of the given healthcare GMN is invalid.

      • addCheckCharacters

        public static java.lang.String addCheckCharacters​(java.lang.String part)
                                           throws GS1Exception
        Complete a given partial healthcare GMN by appending the check character pair.
        Parameters:
        part - a partial healthcare GMN.
        Returns:
        a complete healthcare GMN including the check character pair.
        Throws:
        GS1Exception - if the format of the given healthcare GMN is invalid.

      • verifyCheckCharacters

        public static boolean verifyCheckCharacters​(java.lang.String gmn)
                                     throws GS1Exception
        Verify that a given healthcare GMN has a correct check character pair.
        Parameters:
        gmn - a healthcare GMN.
        Returns:
        true if the healthcare GMN is has a valid check character pair. Otherwise false.
        Throws:
        GS1Exception - if the format of the given healthcare GMN is invalid.

      • goodCharacterPositions

        public static boolean[] goodCharacterPositions​(java.lang.String gmn,
                                               boolean complete)
        Indicate whether each character in a given GMN belongs to the appropriate character set for the character position.
        Parameters:
        gmn - a full or partial healthcare GMN.
        complete - true if a GMN is being provided complete with a check character pair. Otherwise false.
        Returns:
        a boolean array matching each input character: true if the character belongs to the appropriate set. Otherwise false.
